title: Stoneskin
content:
Stoneskin is a Lvl 4 Spell from the Abjuration school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Stoneskin Information

Description: Turn a creature's flesh hard as stone. It takes only half the damage of all non-magical Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage. Level: Lvl 4 spell School: Abjuration School Casting Time: Action Range: Melee Requires Concentration: Yes Saving Throw: No
